thread.title: Colorado’s Troy Terry lifts U.S. past Canada in world junior gold-medal game
thread.title_full: Colorado’s Troy Terry lifts U.S. past Canada in world junior gold-medal game

title: Colorado’s Troy Terry lifts U.S. past Canada in world junior gold-medal game
text: Avalanche claims winger Matt Nieto from San Jose Sharks January 05, 2017, 5:02 pm The Avalanche, mired in a five-game losing streak and a 10-game home winless streak, Thursday said it had claimed winger Matt Nieto on waivers from the San Jose Sharks. Calgary Flames light up Avalanche as Colorado loses fifth straight January 05, 2017, 10:01 am Special teams were the order of the evening at the Scotiabank Saddledome. Unfortunately for the Colorado Avalanche, those of the Calgary Flames were just a tad more special. Colorado Avalanche’s Joe Colborne is back in his native city of Calgary January 05, 2017, 12:27 am A Calgarian born and raised, Colborne is in the lineup as the Avalanche visit the Flames, his former squad, at the Scotiabank Saddledome in hopes of snapping a four-game losing streak. Colorado-groomed Troy Terry carries Team USA into world junior gold medal game January 05, 2017, 9:57 am University of Denver sophomore Troy Terry from Highlands Ranch turned into an American hero Wednesday in Montreal, going 3-for-3 in a seven-round shootout to lead Team USA to a 4-3 victory over Russian in the semifinals of the World Junior Championship.
